document_data.name: ''Wand of Glitterdust''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of glitterdust''''' were magic [[wand]]s that were useful when dealing with ''[[invisible]]'' threats.
document_data.Description: The ''wand of glitterdust'' found in the [[Resurrection Gorge]] in [[Amn]] appeared to be a smooth piece of wood with air around it glittering in a strange light.
document_data.Powers: ''Wands of glitterdust'' possessed a number of charges of the ''[[glitterdust]]'' spells, discharged at the wielder's command. The spell could remove invisibility from creatures and objects affected by the spells and blind creatures for a short period of time.
document_data.History: One ''wand of glitterdust'' was found in a crystal growth at the roots of a great [[oak]] tree at the center of the Resurrection Gorge. The wand may have been used against an ''invisible'' [[tanar'ri]] [[Xachrimos]] who was bound to the Gorge.
